title: Coinflipper (“AIR” Special)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you attack a player that is attacking you at the same time, you will survive the attack.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Flip the coin for two people each night. If it's heads, you deal an Unstoppable attack to them. If it's tails, you deal an Unstoppable attack to them. Additionally, for each heads result, your defense is increased by 1 level until the end of the next day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 4295
*Heads, I win. Tails, you lose.*
